text: Rudolph "Butch" T. Ware III is an American historian and politician. He is the vice presidential nominee of the Green Party in the 2024 United States presidential election. His studies focuses on West Africa and he works at the University of California, Santa Barbara. He formerly taught at the University of Michigan and before then at Northwestern University. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:2024 United States vice-presidential candidates Category:Academics from California Category:Politicians from California Category:Writers from Santa Barbara, California Category:Green Party of the United States politicians Category:American historians
title: Butch Ware
